replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
cb
比较器
方块
红石火把


cb写testfor @p

激活时输出就非门了 23333

你可以改命令

replies.author: Lucky_fish0w0
replies.txt_content:
testforblock 坐标 方块ID -1 {SuccessCount:0}
最习惯用这个后面跟cond
